column13: The invention relates to a process for preparing nThe invention relates to an electronic loading resigrosins, consisting in condensing aniline with niistance in commutation, particularly meant for flutrobenzene or alkylated derivatives thereof, by usorescent lighthing of urbane and railway transporting as a reaction medium an organic solvent inert ation means and for other general applications, such as the safety lighting in case of technical halfrom a chemical point of view, with the boiling point ranging from 170 ... 185 C, selected from 1,2-ls and subsoils, safety escapes, emergency rooms, tunnels etc. The electronic loading resistance in dichlorobenzene, 2-chloro-ethylbenzene or 2-bromo-toluen, by steam entraining the unreacted solvent,commutation consists of an inlet filter (F1) compr aniline and nitrobenzene and isolating the finishising a resistor (R1) and a capacitor (C1), a starting circuit (CS) made by a relaxation oscillator,ed product, by filtering the reaction mass resulti comprising a unijunction transistor (T1) with lowng as an aqueous dispersion. There is ensured the quantitative and qualitative reproducibility of th oscillation frequency, a resistor (R 5), a diode (D 1), which does not allow the voltage on capacite dye-stuffs and lowering the aniline content in the finished product. or (C 2) to reach the threshold value, so that after priming, the diode (D1) takes the relaxation oscillator out of operation, an oscillation generator with bipolar transistors or with integrated circuits, a voltage step up (TR2) provided with a separate winding (TR 2c) for taking over the positive feedback, a circuit for switching on the neon (CAN) provided with a choke (Ls1) for limiting the current through the luminous tube (NE). The electronic loading resistance comprises a trasil diode (DZ1), a diode (DZ3) controlling the transistor (T1) and taking over only the impulse peak, a diode (DZ4) which prevents the circuit symmetry from being affected by parallelly connecting a low value resistor (R5), some capacitors (C4, C7, C8 and C9) and some passive components (C4, C7, C8 and C9) which avoid the commutation overvoltages and eliminate the possibility of occurrence of the spurious radio frequency oscillations irrespective of the manufacturing characteristics of the power transistors.

column12: PROCESS FOR OBTAINING ANTIREFLECTION GLASS AND PROCESS FOR MANUFACTURING THE SAME
column13: Inventia se refera la un procedeu de obtinere a geamului antireflectorizant, prin imersia geamului, timp de 30..60 s, la temperatura camerei într-o baie de atac chimic constituita din 60..70 parti HF si 20..30 parti acid sulfuric si sulfat de amoniu, partile fiind exprimate în greutate. Instalatia de realizare a acestui procedeu este prevazuta cu un sistem de transfer, care deserveste o bateri de bai de tratare a geamului alcatuita din cuve identice, care realizeaza simultan atacul chimic si spalarea geamului.

column12: INSTALLATION AUTOMATIQUE POUR LA DESALINISATION DES MARAIS SALANTS
column15: NITESCU EFTIMIE;;GRADINARU LAURIAN;;BALAN TRAIAN;;LEU DOBRICA;;NITESCU CATALINA;;COJOCARU IOAN;;POPIA ADRIAN;;BALAN DANA;;TOMA STELIANA;;UDRISTE ANETA

column12: AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION FOR REMOVING THE SALT FROM SALINIZATED FIELDS
column13: Inventia se refera la o instalatie automata de conducere a spalarilor de desalinizare, pe terenurile agricole saraturate, prin aplicarea normei totale de spalare fractionata în reprize de spalare, dimensionate optim, în vederea spalarii cu eficienta maxima. Instalatia, conform inventiei, este formata din niste senzori de salinitate montati în sol, un senzor pentru urmarirea mineralizarii apei drenate în parcela de spalare montat la drenul absorbant sau colector al parcelei si o statie ce primeste informatiile senzorilor, prelucreaza si afiseaza datele privind salinitatea solului si, respectiv, mineralizarea apei drenate, luînd decizii de continuare sau oprire a procesului spalarii.

column12: WORKING METHODS AND MULTIFUNCTIONAL SET OF APPARATUSES FOR SURVEYING, ACQUIRING AND AIMING DURING DAYTIME AND NIGHT TIME, BASED ON THERMAL AND VISIBLE RADIATIONS, WITH INTEGRATED COMPUTER
column13: The invention relates to a multifunctional equipment meant to monitor during daytime and night time some areas of interest. According to the invention, the equipment may be carried out in the form of a portable or stationary equipment meant to be mounted on a motor vehicle and mainly consists of the following modules: a block of sensors consisting of two optoelectronic modules for surveying and capturing images which operate in two distinct spectral ranges, infrared and visible range, a remote metering module, a system of positioning and aligning the said modules and a block for interfacing the same, a system of positioning and orienting based on GPS modules, a communication unit ensuring the radio transmission and receiving of information, a data processing system provided with a laptop-type display, a control and checking software application, to which, in case of a portable variant there is added a rucksack for sustaining the component modules and in case of the stationary variant, a "pan & tilt" type platform installed on the vehicle.
